thing-type.label: ZWN4017 UltraPro 800 Series Z-Wave On/Off Switch
thing-type.description:
UltraPro 800 Series Z-Wave On/Off Switch

Overview

Voice control – AMAZON ALEXA AND GOOGLE ASSISTANT COMPATIBLE; requires a Z-Wave certified hub from brands including SmartThings, Ring Alarm, Wink, ADT Pulse, ADT Command, Trane, Vivint, Nexia, Honeywell, HomeSeer, Ezlo and more

DIY design – QuickFit design improved components, reduces housing depth by 20% and eliminated heat tabs while color-coded flying leads offers worry-free wiring

Multi-switch capable – Works in single-pole or multi-switch configurations with up to four compatible add-on switches to maintain full functions of the smart device from all locations or one standard three-way switch for ON/OFF control

Universal compatibility – Wireless range up to 1,300ft. from the controller and take when paired as a Z-Wave Plus Long Range device to hubs supporting Z-Wave LR or connect as a Z-Wave Classic device for a range of 150ft. from the nearest device or hub

Personalization options – ETL safety certified, the smart switch features a customizable LED indicator with eight colors and four operation modes


Inclusion Information

Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to add a device to the Z-Wave network.

Once the controller is ready to add your device, press and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart switch (rocker).

Now you have complete control to turn your fixture ON/OFF according to groups, scenes, schedules and interactive automations programmed by your controller. If your Z-Wave certified controller features remote access, you can control your fixture from your mobile devices.


Exclusion Information

Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified controller to exclude a device to the Z-Wave network.

Once the controller is ready to exclude your device, press and release the top or bottom of the wireless smart switch (rocker).
